name: Aqua (itch) (Cascade Productions)
description:
Tasked with fixing a rapidly crumbling world, you find yourself traversing temples, puzzles and the hostile deserts far from your home, and your family.

However, world in jeopardy requires a legend to resolve, and you can’t go it alone. Aqua follows the adventure of a lone traveller, in search of a legendary spirit with mystical powers to set things right.

Play along in 5 levels of solving puzzles in this 2-D platformer game by Cascade Productions.

Producer -  Annie Canty

QA Director - Anthony Abdulahad

Audio Director - Ben Roberts

Art Director - Francesca Chapman

Design Director - Liam Deering

Tech Director - Stanley Morse
